title: Get rich quick!
body: Do you want to make big money fast?  Our secret investment opportunity guarantees huge returns in no time!   Reply now for more information.

title: Congratulations! You've been selected...
body: Congratulations! You've been selected for an exclusive offer of a lifetime.  Act now to claim your prize!  Reply for more details.

title: I'm sorry
body: Sarah.  If you are reading this then the events have been set in motion. I'm sorry I couldn't be there to witness them, but I hope that they can stay the darkness just a little bit longer.    Amidst the madness, I found the answer. It lies in the place where the hounds roam free.

title: Login
body: To those that come after me, please uncover the truth and end this cycle of madness.  ssh sjohnson:lost_time@p4_division.oni
